CustomField.description: If you indicated no, your student does not reside within one of the member school districts of The Education Cooperative (TEC), please review the following list of additional student situations that can result in enrollment preference. You may choose more than one selection or indicate that none of the situations apply. Please note that relevant documentation substantiating any claim for preference may be requested
CustomField.label: TECCA Not TEC District Situation

value.fullName: Biological or adopted sibling of a student currently attending TECCA.
value.label: Biological or adopted sibling of a student currently attending TECCA.

value.fullName: None of these situations apply to my student.
value.label: None of these situations apply to my student.

value.fullName: Students who are gifted and talented.
value.label: Students who are gifted and talented.

value.fullName: Students who are over-age for their grade.
value.label: Students who are over-age for their grade.

value.fullName: Students who are pregnant or who have a child.
value.label: Students who are pregnant or who have a child.

value.fullName: Students who feel bullied or who are out of school due to other safety concerns.
value.label: Students who feel bullied or who are out of school due to other safety concerns.

value.fullName: Students who have or are at risk of dropping out.
value.label: Students who have or are at risk of dropping out.

value.fullName: Students who seek academic work not available in their school.
value.label: Students who seek academic work not available in their school.

value.fullName: Students with medical needs requiring a home or hospital setting.
value.label: Students with medical needs requiring a home or hospital setting.

value.fullName: Students with unusual needs requiring a flexible schedule.
value.label: Students with unusual needs requiring a flexible schedule.
